fields.title: variational Bayes
fields.pointers:
* Some examples of variational Bayes:
**  [Mixture of Gaussians](variational_mixture_of_gaussians)
**  [linear regression](variational_linear_regression)
**  [logistic regression](variational_logistic_regression)
* Variational Bayes is especially appropriate for  [fitting exponential families](variational_exponential_family) .
* Other approximations to marginal likelihood include:
**  [Laplace approximation](laplace_approximation)
**  [Bayesian information criterion (BIC)](bayesian_information_criterion)
**  [Sampling algorithms](sampling_partition_function)
**  [Tree-reweighted belief propagation](tree_reweighted_belief_propagation)
fields.summary: Bayesian parameter estimation often results in an intractable posterior over model parameters. Variational Bayes is an application of variational inference (in particular, mean field) to approximating the marginals over parameters as well as the marginal likelihood.
